Triceradon gets hit by Drillbit's bullets and dodges away. He turns toward the stasis pod Drillbit was working on and fires a couple of gernades at it ,trying to destroy it.

Stegotron ducks and gets hit in the back by Drillbits bullets. His back armor protected him from getting hurt too badly. He then dodges behind a tree and opens fire on  Drillbit with his cannon.
nbwrpg@egroups.com wrote:
>
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> Hot Rod arrived at the Cybertronian Fire. He stoped and waited for
> Silver Sting to catch up.
> 
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> DrillBit jumped up, soaring over the two Dinobots heads, opening fire
> from above. He had enough of getting blown away. He was a little pissed.
> (If you dont understand what DrillBit is doing, think of Optimus Prime's
> attack at Autobot city, in TF:TM.)
>
